Portland Pricing Change
We've nixed the $199 price and made registration open to "donate what you can". There's a full background story on the site but we are doing it with the hopes of getting to spend the day with a good crowd of like-minded folks. The presentations are going to be fantastic.

Hotel Discount Deadline Passed, but...
If you're looking for Thursday, Friday night you can likely still get the rate if you call 1-503-226-6300.
I'ts $189/night for the Portland Marriott City Center.

Gerding Theater at the Armory
128 NW Eleventh Avenue Portland, Oregon 97209 | 503-445-3700

Cherrie found this awesome location. The building has great history and how they handle their shows is fantastic.

We hope to see you there!
